articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Coldplay cam row: Twist in ex Astronomer HR Kristin Cabot's divorce story; husband says they were already - Times of India
articles.description: US News: Andrew Cabot, husband of former Astronomer HR executive Kristin Cabot, said the couple had already separated before she was caught on kiss cam with ex.

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: THIS silent killer can put you at increased risk of stroke and dementia: How to prevent it - The Times of India
articles.description: High blood pressure is a major risk factor for stroke and dementia. Discover how to prevent hypertension with lifestyle changes and medical guidance.
